definition: mausoleum of the Yellow Emperor/Huangling county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi
Huangling county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi

sentences.english: The result will provide an important evidence for the study of Khodalite lithology in the future.
sentences.chinese: 爲今後黃陵地區孔茲巖系研究提供重要參考。

sentences.english: And finally to the Huangling total of 30 persons Participation Festival.
sentences.chinese: 最後到達黃陵參祭的共有三十人。

sentences.english: He lived alone in Huangling county for forty years with no offspring.
sentences.chinese: 他在黃陵縣孤身一人呆了四十年，無兒無女。
